summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.param: An object containing extension specific settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtension.#ctor(DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings,System.Web.Mvc.ViewContext)

A object that is the view context.

summary.para: Contains specific settings of the Web Dashboard.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowCreateNewDashboard

summary.para: Gets or sets whether an end-user can create new dashboards.

member.value: true, to allow an end-user to create new dashboards; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowCreateNewJsonConnection

summary.para: Gets or sets whether an end user can create a JSON data source with a new data connection.

member.value: true, to allow end users to create a JSON data source with a new data connection; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowExportDashboard

summary.para: Gets or sets whether end-users can export a dashboard.

member.value: true, if end-users can export a dashboard; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowExportDashboardItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether end-users can export dashboard items.

member.value: true, if end-users can export dashboard items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowInspectAggregatedData

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display aggregated data in the Data Inspector.

member.value: true, to display aggregated data in the Data Inspector; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowInspectRawData

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display raw data in the Data Inspector.

member.value: true, to display raw data in the Data Inspector; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowMaximizeItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether end users can maximize dashboard items.

member.value: true, to allow maximizing dashboard items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.AllowOpenDashboard

summary.para: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open existing dashboards.

member.value: true, to allow an end-user to open existing dashboards; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.BackendOptions

summary.para: Provides access to the Web Dashboard's back-end options.

member.value: A object that contains the Web Dashboard's back-end options.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.CanCreateNewJsonDataSource

summary.para: This property is no longer used. Use instead.

member.value: true, to allow end users to create a JSON data source with a new data connection; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ClientInstanceName

summary.para: Gets or sets the Web Dashboard 's client programmatic identifier.

member.value: A that specifies the Web Dashboard's client identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ClientSideEvents

summary.para: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the .

member.value: A object which allows assigning handlers to the client-side events available to the .

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ControllerName

summary.para: Gets or sets the controller name.

member.value: A that specifies the controller name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.DashboardId

summary.para: Gets or sets the dashboard identifier.

member.value: A that specifies the dashboard identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.DashboardState

summary.para: Gets or sets the dashboard state (such as the master filtering state) for the Web Dashboard.

member.value: A value that specifies the dashboard state for the Web Dashboard.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.DataRequestOptions

summary.para: Provides access to the Web Dashboard's data request options.

member.value: A value used to specify a data request mode for a dashboard.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.EnableCustomSql

summary.para: Enables a user to specify a custom SQL string in the Data Source wizard.

member.value: true, to allow a user to specify a custom SQL string in the Data Source wizard; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ExcelExportOptions

summary.para: Provides access to options related to exporting a dashboard item to the Excel format.

member.value: A object containing options related to exporting a dashboard item to the Excel format.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ExportOptions

summary.para: Provides access to dashboard options specific to export.

member.value: A object that contains settings which specify parameters affecting how the dashboard (dashboard items) is exported.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ImageExportOptions

summary.para: Provides access to options related to exporting a dashboard/dashboard item to an image.

member.value: A object containing options related to exporting a dashboard/dashboard item to an image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.IncludeDashboardIdToUrl

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the will be included in the Web Dashboard's URL.

member.value: true, to include the in the Web Dashboard's URL; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.IncludeDashboardStateToUrl

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dashboard state (such as the master filtering state) will be included in the Web Dashboard's URL.

member.value: true, to include the dashboard state in the Web Dashboard's URL; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.InitialDashboardId

summary.para: Gets or sets the identifier of the dashboard to be loaded to the ASP.NET MVC Dashboard extension.

member.value: A value that specifies the identifier of the dashboard to be loaded to the ASP.NET MVC Dashboard extension.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.InitialDashboardState

summary.para: Gets or sets the initial dashboard state when loading a dashboard.

member.value: A value that specifies the initial dashboard state.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.LimitVisibleDataMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a data limitation mode that allows you to display a reduced form of visible data.

member.value: A value that is a data limitation mode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.LoadDefaultDashboard

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the default dashboard should be loaded from the dashboard storage.

member.value: true, to load the default dashboard from the dashboard storage; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.MobileLayoutEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets a mobile layout mode for the Web Dashboard.

member.value: A object that specifies a mobile layout mode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.PdfExportOptions

summary.para: Provides access to options related to exporting a dashboard/dashboard item to the PDF format.

member.value: A object containing options related to exporting a dashboard/dashboard item to the PDF format.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.ShowConfirmationOnBrowserClosing

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the web browser displays a confirmation message when an-end user closes a page containing the Web Dashboard.

member.value: true, if the web browser displays a confirmation message when an-end user closes a page containing the Web Dashboard; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.UseCardLegacyLayout

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable the legacy card layout used prior to v17.1.

member.value: true, to enable the legacy card layout used prior to v17.1; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.UseNeutralFilterMode

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to show all items in the filter elements deselected by default.

member.value: true, if all items in the filter elements deselected by default; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardWeb.Mvc.DashboardExtensionSettings.WorkingMode

summary.para: Gets or sets the working mode of the Web Dashboard.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies the working mode of the Web Dashboard.
